parameters.name: BusinessInfo
parameters.description: The additional business information about the instance.

parameters.name: ClientToken
parameters.description: The client token that is used to ensure the idempotence of the request.

parameters.name: DBInstanceClass
parameters.description: The instance type of the instance. For more information, see [Primary instance types](~~26312~~). By default, the current instance type applies.

parameters.name: DBInstanceId
parameters.description: The instance ID. You can call the DescribeDBInstances operation to query the instance ID.

parameters.name: OrderType
parameters.description: The type of order. Set the value to **BUY**.

parameters.name: PayType
parameters.description:
The billing method of the instance. Valid values:

*   **Postpaid**: pay-as-you-go
*   **Prepaid**: subscription

parameters.name: Quantity
parameters.description: The number of the instances. Default value: **1**.

parameters.name: RegionId
parameters.description: The region ID. You can call the DescribeRegions operation to query the most recent region list.

parameters.name: ResourceGroupId
parameters.description: The resource group ID. You can call the DescribeDBInstanceAttribute operation to query the resource group ID.

parameters.name: TimeType
parameters.description:
The renewal cycle of the instance. Valid values:

*   **Year**
*   **Month**

parameters.name: UsedTime
parameters.description:
The subscription duration of the instance. Valid values:

*   If you set the **TimeType** parameter to **Year**, the value of the UsedTime parameter is within the range of **1 to 3**.
*   If you set the **TimeType** parameter to **Month**, the value of the UsedTime parameter is within the range of **1 to 9**.
